name: Iaso
description: Platform for data collection, georegistry, activity planning and monitoring.

SDGs.evidenceText: Iaso has been selected as the next software platform to support the World Food Programme track its CODA scheme
Iaso is used to produce health maps, to build a Polio outbreaks tracking platform and also to collect data in the context of Performance Based Financing
Iaso has been used to improve the quality of information about schools in DRC
